function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence of the European economy on China","Impact":"Potential relocation of industries, leading to economic instability","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply chains and investment in domestic industries","Technologies":"Supply chain management technologies, automation, advanced manufacturing","People":"European industries, workers, and consumers","Owner":"Government, industry leaders, and trade organizations"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of the poor to disease","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to contagious diseases and limited access to healthcare","Mitigation":"Improving access to healthcare, economic support for vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health applications, economic aid platforms","People":"Poor and marginalized communities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies, NGOs"},{"Description":"Global economic crisis due to COVID-19 containment measures","Impact":"Severe economic downturn, unemployment, and disruption of supply chains","Mitigation":"Stimulus packages, economic recovery plans, investment in infrastructure","Technologies":"Economic forecasting models, financial management systems, digital infrastructure","People":"Global workforce, businesses, and governments","Owner":"International organizations, government leaders, financial institutions"}]}
